Der Scherenantrieb gleichen technischen Eigenschaften CUT F , CUT S SpeedCUT . Grossmann Maschinenbau Home - Grossmann Skip navigation The Company Contact Imprint Board cutting machine CUTmatic Learn more about this product Scissors with two blade cassettes Learn more about this product Web guiding systems Learn more about this product Cutting systems Learn more about this product Skip navigation Home Handling Technology Presses, Scissors, Plants Tool construction Winding Technology Special solutions Welcome to GROSSMANN mechanical engineering We are innovative company that has its main focus on building technically superior machines which are based on standardized assemblies and machines. We are able to provide you with the idea, the design and the production of machines, i.e. we do all the work for you. Our products the field winding technique include, among others, slitter machines, rewinders, friction winders, winding shafts, circular blades and circular knives for paper cutting and crushing, control for web tension, web tension, web speed, web edge and web guidance. In the product area sheet and profile processing, we provide, among others, transverse electric shears, crop shears, high speed shears, stackers, belt conveyors, rotary heads, punching and stamping tools. Grossmann Maschinenbau bietet: Sondermaschinenbau Standardmaschinenbau Steuerungsbau Wickeltechnik Handhabungstechnik Sonderlösungen - Grossmann de Navigation überspringen Unternehmen Kontakt Impressum Platinen-Schneideanlage CUTmatic Erfahren Sie Schere 2 Messerkassetten Erfahren Sie Bahnlaufregelungen Erfahren Sie Schneidesysteme Erfahren Sie Navigation überspringen Startseite Handhabungstechnik Pressen, Scheren, Anlagen Werkzeugbau Wickeltechnik Sonderlösungen Das Unternehmen Wir innovatives Unternehmen Schwerpunkt technisch hochwertigen Maschinenbau. Basis standardisierte Baugruppen Maschinen. Von Idee, Konstruktion Bau Maschine liefern Hand. Zu unseren Produkten Bereich Wickeltechnik zählen u.a. Rollenschneidmaschinen, Umroller, Friktionswickler, Wickelwellen, Rundmesser Kreismesser für Scherenschnitt Quetschschnitt, Regler für Bahnspannung, Bahnzug, Bahngeschwindigkeit, Bahnkanten Bahnlauf. Im Produktbereich Blech- Profilverarbeitung liefern u.a. elektrische Querteilscheren, Hochgeschwindigkeitsscheren, Abstapler, Bandanlagen Rundschaltköpfe, Stanz- Prägewerkzeuge. Sie finden Anlagen Bereichen Branchen, „Standard“ einfach ist. Unser Standard es, maßgeschneiderte wirtschaftliche Lösungen speziell für Ihren Anwendungsfall liefern. Wir setzen daran, Know-how, Flexibilität Innovationen, für Sie jeweils optimale Lösung realisieren. General execution guidelines - Grossmann Skip navigation The Company Contact Imprint Board cutting machine CUTmatic Learn more about this product Scissors with two blade cassettes Learn more about this product Web guiding systems Learn more about this product Cutting systems Learn more about this product Skip navigation Home Handling Technology Presses, Scissors, Plants Tool construction Winding Technology Special solutions General execution guidelines A. General execution guidelines If the execution guidelines cannot be complied with, Grossmann Engineering is to be informed by all suppliers and turn the end user must be advised of the changes made. Changes or additions must be approved writing by Grossmann Engineering. With its confirmation the subcontractor guarantees by the confirmation all items on this execution policy. The customer confirms the order with all the points of this execution policy. In the manufacturing and assembly of products for Grossmann Engineering is the highest possible care must be taken . Grossmann Engineering is committed to the highest possible care and diligence for its customers. To ensure the flawless realization, the technical execution must be carried out according to the rules. During the execution of complete machinery / equipment, the following must be observed: The provisions of the relevant DIN , ISO and VDE standards must be observed. The components of the respective manufacturer's installation instructions must be followed. The requirements of the EC Machinery Directive (98/37/EC ) must be complied with the scope of supply. The present operator stations on the machine or system itself are designed according to ergonomic principles and conform to the latest findings. The machine / system and its protective equipment correspond to the electrical, hydraulic and pneumatic demands of the safety regulations and the currently valid laws and regulations on environmental protection. Attention must be paid to low-noise operation of the machine or system. It is especially important that the individual sound pressure level of 85 dB (A ) is not exceeded the operating area of the machine / plant. Excluded are working noise of tools, workpieces and workpiece transport. Operating Conditions: Unless otherwise agreed, the machine is constructed for the following operational environment. Installation location hall Ambient temperature: 15 ÷ 30°C Environment: without risk of explosion Humidity: 40 ÷ 80% Pollution: no pollution and pollutant Skip navigation The Company The firm Conditions of Delivery References General execution guidelines Contact Imprint Contact Do you have any question, requests or need further information? Grossmann Maschinenbau Rundmesser Kreismesser Friktionswickler Wickeltechnik Sondermaschinen Wickelwellen Schwenkscheren Querteilscheren Abstapler Umroller - Grossmann Skip navigation The Company Contact Imprint Board cutting machine CUTmatic Learn more about this product Scissors with two blade cassettes Learn more about this product Web guiding systems Learn more about this product Cutting systems Learn more about this product Skip navigation Home Handling Technology Presses, Scissors, Plants Tool construction Winding Technology Special solutions Conditions of Delivery The enclosed VDMA terms of delivery apply and are supplemented by the following conditions: Machine Design The machine design meets the standards set by Grossmann. Al- surfaces, galvanized or plated surfaces and surfaces of plastic parts are not normally painted. Other surfaces are burnished black or painted black , moss green (RAL 6005) or gray Tele 4 (RAL 7047). Any other customer requirements concerning the interface design or color are described the specifications . Subsequent client requests are billed at cost. Credentials The Customer agrees that he may be called as reference. Execution of the control Software: standard the programming of PLC controllers are the following types of control: automatic operation, manual operation and service operation. The changeover to manual operation is only possible with key switch. The service operation is programmed exclusively for the maintenance personnel and only available with key switch and password. We program the control functions accordance with our safety standards and requirements for the correct functioning of the machine. The designation of electric parts such as cables, terminals, sensors, motors and other electrical components comply with the current standards and our standards. Pneumatic and hydraulic lines and components comply with market standards and our standards. From points to differing customer requirements are described the specifications. Subsequent client requests are billed at cost. Material provided for by the customer material for commissioning: The materials needed for the construction or commissioning of the machine are made available to us for free. This material corresponds to the information the specifications and be delivered time for the production or commissioning by the customer. The customer is responsible for the timely delivery and the quality of the material. If there is delay delivery, the agreed delivery date be delayed accordingly. A new delivery date be set by the Grossmann Company after the receipt of the material and the customer be informed. The machine is built, tested and commissioned at the company Grossmann or sro operation according to the master material. The factory acceptance test is done with the same material. If during the acceptance or during the subsequent production other materials are used, and thereby cause interference or damage to the machine, this happens at the expense of the customer. An order is considered accepted if the customer does not contradict the order confirmation within 10 days of its issuance. If the customer alters the ongoing project any way, the project be stopped and the customer receive supplementary offer which consider the changes desired. Depending on the complexity caused by the alterations, new delivery date be agreed on with the customer. The delivery schedule begins with receipt of the first payment. The warranty period starts from the date of delivery. Within the warranty period, the maintenance of the delivery item must be carried out according to the instruction manual. The maintenance must be substantiated by performance records and protocols. The place of jurisdiction is Ellwangen. Stackers - Grossmann Engineering - Grossmann Skip navigation The Company Contact Imprint Board cutting machine CUTmatic Learn more about this product Scissors with two blade cassettes Learn more about this product Web guiding systems Learn more about this product Cutting systems Learn more about this product Skip navigation Home Handling Technology Presses, Scissors, Plants Tool construction Winding Technology Special solutions Scissors with automatic Stacking The band slides into the stacker on brush plates. After cutting process, the boards fall vertically without scratching onto the stack. The platinum stack automatically rolls out of the stacker. During the stack change, the boards can be stored. Therefore, continuous cutting operation is possible. Stacker for boards made ​​of steel strip Low-cost, patented stacker, even for shears . The stacking function is fully automatic. In this case, the stacker is directly behind the machine. The board drop is scratch-free and the boards are guided laterally onto the stack. The finished stack is moved away manually and placed at the desired location. The stacker can always be used to automatically or manually insert the boards at the same height. Here, the lifting process is controlled as that the removal height is always the same height . Nachträgliche Kundenwünsche Aufwand verrechnet. Referenzen Der Kunde einverstanden, Referenzkunde genannt darf. Ausführung Steuerung Software: Standard Programmierung SPS-Steuerungen Steuerungsarten Automatikbetrieb, Handbetrieb Servicebetrieb. Die Umschaltung Handbetrieb Schlüsselschalter möglich. Die Funktionen Steuerung programmieren entsprechend Sicherheitsnormen festgelegten Notwendigkeiten Maschinenfunktionen. Die Bezeichnung Elektroteilen z.B. Leitungen, Klemmen, Sensoren, Motoren sonstigen elektrischen Komponenten entspricht Normen unserem Standard. Pneumatische hydraulische Leitungen Komponenten entsprechen Normen unserem Standard. Kommt Lieferverzug, verzögert vereinbarte Liefertermin entsprechendem Umfang. Von Firma Grossmann Erhalt Materials neuer Liefertermin festgelegt Kunden mitgeteilt. Passend Mustermaterial Maschine gebaut, getestet Firma Grossmann Betrieb genommen. Auch Abnahme erfolgt identischen Material. Sollten Abnahme späteren Produktion Materialien verwendet Störungen Beschädigungen Maschine kommen, Lasten Kunden. Ein Auftrag gilt angenommen, Kunde binnen 10 Tagen Erstellung Auftragsbestätigung widerspricht. Mit 3 Mitarbeitern Kunden beraten technische Lösungen ausgearbeitet. Die Fertigung fremd vergeben. Der Produktionsschwerpunkt Fa. Grossmann Partner technisch innovative Maschinenbau. Neben Standardmaschinen sehen Stärke Beratung Kunden Realisierung innovativen, kundenspezifischen Lösungen. Die Firma europaweit tätig. Manueller Querschneider für schmale Bahnen Querschneider Teil unseres Wickeltechnik-Baukastensystems. Querschneider für breite Bahnen: Die Bahn läuft über gehärtete Welle. Zum Querschneiden rollt Rundmesser hoher Geschwindigkeit quer über gehärtete Welle. Der Querschneider Bahnantrieb, Bahnklemmung Kleberauftrag z.B. für Endblattverklebung lieferbar. Querschneider für schmale Bahnen: Er für manuellen automatischen Betrieb, Bahnklemmung lieferbar. Beim Querschneiden Bahn rollt Rundmesser über gehärtete Fläche. Häufig Wicklerbaugruppen Querschneidern kombiniert. Schicken Sie nähere Angaben Ihnen gewünschten Querschneider, Sie erhalten kurzfristig Angebot. CUT S, Swivel shears - Grossmann Engineering - Grossmann Skip navigation The Company Contact Imprint Board cutting machine CUTmatic Learn more about this product Scissors with two blade cassettes Learn more about this product Web guiding systems Learn more about this product Cutting systems Learn more about this product Skip navigation Home Handling Technology Presses, Scissors, Plants Tool construction Winding Technology Special solutions CUT S, Swivel shears The upper blade of this durable and inexpensive scissor CUT S is hydraulically driven. The mechanical synchronization allows off-center loading. The pivoting movement is carried out by the servo motor and is freely programmable. The positioning accuracy is: 0.01o. The blades are quickly replaceable and can be easily and precisely adjusted by differential screws with scaling. Cutting gap adjustment and blank holder are available on request. The only difference between the CUT S and the stationary scissors CUT F is the substructure. A sub-sequent conversion from CUT S to CUT F and vice versa is possible with very little effort. Diese Sondermaschine beinhaltet anderem über Bildverarbeitung angesteuertes 4-Achs-Handling läuft Reinraumbedingungen. Von Hand LCD-Anzeigen-Rohling eingelegt anschließend Automatikzyklus gestartet. Ein servogesteuertes 4-Achs-Handling entnimmt Magazin elektrische Kontaktleiste. Das Handling legt Kontaktleiste schwimmend Kleber hält Leiste fest. Ein Kamerasystem nachgeschalteter Bildverarbeitung nimmt Lage Leiterbahnen Kontaktleiste LCD-Anzeigen-Rohling auf. Die errechneten Werte übernimmt servogesteuerte Handling. Eine Genauigkeit 50 µm deutlich übertroffen. LCD-Anzeigen können Taktzeit ca. 55 Sekunden gefertigt werden. Das Fertigungsverfahren entwickelten wir, Handlinganlage konstruiert gebaut. Handling for LCD displays - Handling Technology by Grossmann - Grossmann Skip navigation The Company Contact Imprint Board cutting machine CUTmatic Learn more about this product Scissors with two blade cassettes Learn more about this product Web guiding systems Learn more about this product Cutting systems Learn more about this product Skip navigation Home Handling Technology Presses, Scissors, Plants Tool construction Winding Technology Special solutions Handling for LCD displays Devices, machines and equipment for the assembly are built according to customer requirements. Among other things, this special machine contains 4-axis handling which is driven by image processing and runs under clean room conditions. The LCD-display blanks are inserted by hand and, subsequently, the automatic process is initiated. A servo-controlled 4-axis handling system removes electrical contact strip from magazine. The handling sets the floating contact bar the adhesive and holds the bar fixed position. A camera system with downstream image processing records the location of the contact strip and LCD display blank. The servo-controlled handling assumes the calculated values. An accuracy of 50 microns is significantly exceeded. LCD displays can be produced cycle time of approximately 55 seconds. We developed the manufacturing process and designed and built the handling system. Nach Schnitt fallen Platinen senkrecht geführt Kratzerbildung Stapel. Die Platinenstapel rollen automatisch Abstapler. Während Stapelwechsels lassen Platinen zwischenspeichern. Dadurch kontinuierlicher Schneidbetrieb möglich. Abstapler für Platinen Bandstahl. Preiswerter, patentierter Stapler, für Tafelscheren. Die Abstapelfunktion vollautomatisch. Dabei steht Stapler direkt Schere. Die Platinen fallen kratzfrei seitlich geführt Stapel. Der fertige Stapel manuell weggefahren gewünschten Ort abgesetzt. Der Stapler automatischen manuellen Platinenentnahme gleicher Höhe eingesetzt werden. Dabei hebt Platinenstapel gesteuert oben, Entnahmehöhe bleibt. Punching tool for profile rails - by Grossmann Engineering - Grossmann Skip navigation The Company Contact Imprint Board cutting machine CUTmatic Learn more about this product Scissors with two blade cassettes Learn more about this product Web guiding systems Learn more about this product Cutting systems Learn more about this product Skip navigation Home Handling Technology Presses, Scissors, Plants Tool construction Winding Technology Special solutions Punching tool for profile rails The punching tool is adjustable for profile rails of different widths and lengths. The rail is manually placed on the punch tool and during the punching operation held the hand. The tool controller recognizes the right rail position, clamps the rail clamped automatically, punches all four vertical bars and releases the rail. The operating sequence takes about 1.5 sec " In one single step, the tool punches 4 vertical profiles webs ( 2x on the left and 2x on the right) the profile end.
